ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Great survey course on Sub-Saharan African issues. Final paper was open-ended which allowed digging deep into a particular area of interest.
Yes, agreat introduction to the important trends, history, and political climate in Africa.

A very thorough and fascinating survey of the most important trends shaping events in sub-Saharan Africa today. Would absolutely recommend the course for students with any interest whatsoever in Africa.

The course gave me an extensive and profound view of all the challenges and opportunities of the African region. I would highly recommend the course, no matter what of the student's background or career interests may be. It adds significant value to you in an individual basis as well as a professional one, and keeps you interested and motivated throughout.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Very much extended my knowledge of Africa and current issues in the continent.

The course provided me an important opportunity to integrate and solidify my prior learnings and experience related to Africa in a way that will serve me well as I consider the possibility focusing professionally on the continent.
As an MBA student, taking this class was an opportunity to learn something new and different, and that contributed to my knowledge base in a significant way.
